Click Next to analyze the data.
Analyzing received data. This might take a few minutes. Please wait…

Since new accounting records appear in both applications, it is recommended that you map the data. It will help you avoid duplication of catalog items recorded independently in both applications, for example, items with the same name. Use the mapping to identify duplicate data.
All data is mapped. Ensure that the automatic data mapping was performed correctly.
Statistics information tree context menu group 1
Indicates whether unmapped data is found.
Statistics tree number of mapped objects group
Export addition export option node as string
Save the settings or select previously saved settings.
Registering data for export. Please wait...
Synchronizing data. This might take some time. Please wait…
Warning on exchange via internal publication
Once you close the window, synchronization will run in the background. To stop it, click "Finish synchronization".
Error of importing message for mapping

An error occurred while importing a message for mapping. It is recommended that you export data from application "%1" again and start synchronization in this application. You can also delete the message for mapping. In this case, synchronization runs in normal mode.
You can set a schedule for automatic data synchronization.
Click Finish to complete the wizard.
Import data to the infobase for the selected line(s).
